name: Will generative AI live up to its hype? - IBM Blog
snippet: He predicts that AI will increase US productivity by 0.5% and GDP growth by a mere 0.9% in the coming decade. “Every human invention should be celebrated, and generative AI is a true human invention. But too much optimism and hype may lead to the premature use of technologies that are not yet ready for prime time,” says Acemoglu.

name: When Generative AI Meets Product Development - MIT Sloan Management Review
snippet: Innovation groups are using generative AI to enhance ideation and creativity, gain market and customer insights, and add user-friendly interfaces to sophisticated systems.
